
snap(0,0,0)

sky(10000,10000,10000)
fog(200,200,200)
ground(100,100,100)
polys(110,110,110)

fadefrom(13865)
density(8421503)

name(MADNESS X Infinity)

nlaps(20)

set(14,1750,1750,250,-90)p
chk(38,1750,0,250,0)
set(14,1750,-1750,250,180)p
chk(38,0,-1750,250,90)
set(14,-1750,-1750,250,90)p
chk(38,-1750,0,250,0)
set(14,-1750,1750,250,0)p
chk(38,0,1750,250,90)

fix(41,0,9900,-99929000,0)
fix(41,0,-9900,-99929000,0)
fix(41,9900,0,-99929000,90)
fix(41,-9900,0,-99929000,90)

maxb(7,-10000,-15000)
maxt(7,10000,-15000)
maxr(7,10000,-15000)
maxl(7,-10000,-15000)

set(35,10000,10000,250,-45)
set(35,10000,-10000,250,45)
set(35,-10000,-10000,250,-45)
set(35,-10000,10000,250,45)

set(38,0,1750,250,0)po
set(14,-1750,1750,250,0)po
set(38,-1750,0,250,90)po
set(14,-1750,-1750,250,90)po
set(38,0,-1750,250,0)po
set(14,1750,-1750,250,180)po
set(38,1750,0,250,90)po
set(14,1750,1750,250,-90)po

maxt(1,58000,0)
maxb(1,-58000,0)
maxr(1,58000,0)
maxl(1,-58000,0)
